hero.title: Transform Food Waste into Community Care
hero.subtitle: Connect food donors with those in need. Track your impact, reduce waste, and build a sustainable future together.

features.title: Why Choose EcoEatSolutions
features.realTimeDesc: Monitor food donations and pickups in real-time with our live map
features.communityDesc: Connect with local restaurants, NGOs, and individuals
features.impactDesc: Track your environmental and social impact

nutrition.title: Nutrition Calculator
nutrition.subtitle: Calculate nutritional values for your food donations

emergency.title: Emergency Mode
emergency.description: Activate to send urgent email alerts to all registered donors and organizations
emergency.warning: This will send an email alert to all registered users including donors, NGOs, and receivers. Only use this for genuine emergencies requiring immediate food distribution.

browse.title: Browse Donations
browse.subtitle: Find available food donations near you
browse.checkLater: Check back later for new food donations

footer.mission: Our mission is to reduce food waste and feed those in need through technology and community collaboration.
